name:
Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - 
Welcome amiibo: Update
formal_name:
Animal Crossing™: New Leaf -
Welcome amiibo: Update
description:
An update for Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo should download the update.
This will update the software to Version 1.5 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
